text: I am trying to insert a Blog author for a post: {{content.blog_post_author.display_name}}, however when I surround by a <a href=“”>{{content.blog_post_author.display_name}}</a>, with no href set, it auto puts in the path to the blog post, I want to change the destination to another page, but it keeps adding that at the beginning of whatever I add in the href, like if I do this: <a href=“#test”>{{ content.blog_author }}</a>, it adds <a href=“<https://mycompanydomain.com/blog/blog-post-url#test>”>{{ content.blog_author }}</a>

I am trying to insert a Blog author for a post: {{content.blog_post_author.display_name}}, however when I surround by a <a href=“”>{{content.blog_post_author.display_name}}</a>, with no href set, it auto puts in the path to the blog post, I want to change the destination to another page, but it keeps adding that at the beginning of whatever I add in the href, like if I do this: <a href=“#test”>{{ content.blog_author }}</a>, it adds <a href=“<https://mycompanydomain.com/blog/blog-post-url#test|https://mycompanydomain.com/blog/blog-post-url#test>”>{{ content.blog_author }}</a>
